results.title: Propranolol-induced psychosis.
results.text_hl: However, @DISEASE_Apraxias @DISEASE_MESH:D001072 @@@paranoid ideations@@@, illusions, severe combativeness, and @DISEASE_Hallucinations @DISEASE_MESH:D006212 @@@visual hallucinations@@@ developed shortly after initiation of the listed therapy. When @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was substituted for @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, all @<m>DISEASE_Psychotic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011618 @@@psychotic behavior@@@ resolved.

citations.NLM: McGahan DJ, Wojslaw A, Prasad V, Blankenship S. Propranolol-induced psychosis. Drug Intell Clin Pharm. 1984 Jul-Aug;18(7-8):601-3. PMID: 6745087
